properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 c1 v6 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 v6 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 v6 c1 v6 v6

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I hear your voice so clearly I feel your hand guide

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I know that you are near me in you I can hide

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I bring my life to you Lord I give you my all

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: No pris’ner of the law His freedom holds me hear

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: I’m bound by bands of grace

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: I leave old things behind me to find all things new

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: For now the dreams that blind me are realized in you

verse.name: c1j
verse.lines: I’ve made the choice to follow through Him I will not fall

verse.name: c1k
verse.lines: No pow’r can separate us I’m captive to the call

verse.name: c1l
verse.lines: My hope is built on nothing less

verse.name: c1m
verse.lines: Than Jesus blood and His righteousness
